div.p:
This resource summarizes a series of images or other instances generated as part of an imaging study, and provides references to where the images are available using WADO-RS.
This resource is used to make information available concerning images etc. that are referenced in other clinical contexts such as diagnostic reports, Care Plans, etc. Also, see the use case description below.

The elements in this resource mirror DICOM attributes which are listed in the description. Although it is not necessary to use DICOM infrastructure to use this resource, it may be informative to search in DICOM PS3.3 for the referenced tags to better understand their proper contents and usage.
